New Records: Coby White set a career-high with nine three-pointers in a single game
Key Match Events: Chicago Bulls won 139-126 against the New York Knicks
Zach LaVine and Coby White each dropped 33 points apiece
Pre-Game Insights: The Chicago Bulls honored Derrick Rose on 'Derrick Rose Night'
The franchise announced that they would be lifting his jersey into the rafters next season
Post-Match Reflections: Coby White said they wanted to win for Derrick Rose
The win over the Knicks was a huge home win for the Bulls
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Bulls move to 16-19 on the season and have now won three of their last four games
Chicago continues to show they can compete with anyone, as they have now beaten four of the top five teams in the Eastern Conference this season
Others: Karl-Anthony Towns had a 44-point outing for the Knicks
Jalen Brunson scored 33 points for the Knicks
